{{Wired embedded system |brand=MikroTik |model=RouterBOARD 411 |revision=(RB411) |upc=700175496195 |ean= |asin=B004EHRDF0;US; |price= |est_release_date=01/31/2008 |fcc_date=07/02/2009 |manuf_country=Latvia |is_manuf= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=single-board computer |fcc_id=TV7RB411AR, TV7RB411UAHR |pwr_v=12-28 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=802.3af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7130;AR7130-BC1A; |cpu1_cspeed=300 |fla1=64 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=NAND512W3A2DN6 |fla1_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4H561638N-LCCC |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, RS232,, (DB9),, |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8012 |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3243C;;1; ,,, High Performance CPLD;Xilinx;XC9536XL;;1; |flags= |stock_boot=RouterBOOT |stock_os=RouterOS |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |default_ip=192.168.88.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui_eth=00:0C:42, D4:CA:6D }} [http://routerboard.com/RB411 Product page] (RB411)
[http://routerboard.com/RB411L Product page] (RB411L) :[http://i.mt.lv/routerboard/files/RB400L_differences.pdf Differences RB411/RB411L] :[http://routerboard.com/pdf/rb411ugA.pdf User's Manual] (dated 2008-01-31) This device is using an [http://www.xilinx.com/support/documentation/data_sheets/ds058.pdf ''Xilinx'' XC9536XL CPLD]. :Flash and RAM manufacturer varies widely on examples in use. Newer versions have 128MB flash and use IC+ IP101A for ETH chip2 instead of [[Atheros]] AR8012. ===Device versions=== *[http://www.ciudadwireless.com/mikrotik_rb-411l_mikrotik_routerboard_411l_-level_rb411l_rb-411l-p-5834.html MikroTik RB411L] ('''AR7130''' @300MHz/32MB/64MB) [http://routerboard.com/RB411L PPage] *[http://www.ciudadwireless.com/mikrotik_rb-411r_routerboard_with_300mhz_atheros_cpu-_32mb_ram-_lan-_built_2-4ghz_wireless_card-_routeros-p-3024.html MikroTik RB411R] ('''AR7130''' @300MHz/32MB/802.11bg) [http://routerboard.com/RB411R PPage] *[http://www.ciudadwireless.com/mikrotik_rb-411ar_routerboard_300mhz_atheros_minipci-_2-4ghz_wireless_routeros-p-3025.html MikroTik RB411AR] ('''AR7130''' @300MHz/32MB/miniPCI/AR2417 (bg)) [http://routerboard.com/RB411AR PPage] *[http://www.ciudadwireless.com/mikrotik_rb-411u_routerboard_with_300mhz_atheros_cpu-_32mb_ram-_lan-_minipci-_1minipcie-_slot-_routeros-p-3023.html MikroTik RB411U] ('''AR7130''' @300MHz/32MB/USB 2.0/miniPCIe/SIM) [http://routerboard.com/RB411U PPage] *[http://www.ciudadwireless.com/mikrotik_rb-411ah_atheros_ar7130_300mhz_memory_storage_routeros-p-3026.html MikroTik RB411AH] ('''AR7161''' @680MHz/32MB/64MB/miniPCI/LAN) [http://routerboard.com/RB411AH PPage] *[http://www.ciudadwireless.com/mikrotik_rb-411gl_mikrotik_routerboard-p-5833.html MikroTik RB411GL] ('''AR7161''' @680MHz/32MB/64MB/miniPCI/LAN) [http://routerboard.com/RB411GL PPage] *[http://www.ciudadwireless.com/mikrotik_rb-411uahl_mikrotik_routerboard_411uahl-p-5835.html MikroTik RB411UAHL] ('''AR7161''' @680MHz/64MB/miniPCI/LAN/USB 2.0) [http://routerboard.com/RB411UAHL PPage] *[http://www.ciudadwireless.com/mikrotik_rb-411uahr-_mikrotik_routerboard_411uahr_-level_rb411uahr_rb-411uahr-p-4227.html MikroTik RB411UAHR] ('''AR7161''' @680MHz/64MB/USB 2.0/AR2417 (bg)) [http://routerboard.com/RB411UAHR PPage] __NOTOC__
